title: Ep 286: Dating is a Dud
itunes:title: Ep 286: Dating is a Dud
description:
This week on Whoreible Decisions, Mandii & Weezy get back into their woes of dating and they both currently stand in the realm of love. While both navigate being single and dating again, they both find their standards to have changed in what they want after both ending strong relationships. This week’s Vanilla Sh-t touches on Frank Ocean releasing his $250k cockring while the Heaux Fact about working more = sexing LESS!! Find out how overworking can actually lead to a lower sex drive. Mandii shares a sex tip on Wax Play before the duo gets into a study about how raised dating standards by women is actually causing dating to be tougher for men.

Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii B @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages
Instagram @whoreible_decisions
Twitter @whoreiblepod

Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
